content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I did not receive any new information or updates.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://coinmarketcap.com/", "question": "How can I download historical data of meme coins?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on how to download historical data of meme coins. It explains CoinMarketCap's mission to provide up-to-date and unbiased information about the crypto market, and provides definitions for altcoins, ICOs, stablecoins, and in-game tokens. It also offers information on the current prices, market cap, and volume of cryptocurrencies, and explains the calculation of cryptocurrency prices, valuations, and market cap. The text does not offer financial or investment advice but provides options for managing cookie preferences and links to various sections of the website. \n \n Links: [' (https://coinmarketcap.com/)', '24,273 (https://coinmarketcap.com/)', '622 (https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/)', '$1,123,096,128,057 (https://coinmarketcap.com/charts/)', '$31,865,711,890 (https://coinmarketcap.com/charts/)']"}]
"""
